row.entry: The Slot Die Top Jaw and the Slot Die Shim should be removed for cleaning and the Slot Die Bottom Jaw will be left in place.
The Slot Die Top Jaw, Shim and Slot Die Bottom Jaw should be cleaned separately by using an appropriate cleaning solution (solvent, alcohol, water, ...) for the coating liquid that was used
During this process, the Slot Die Top Jaw should be inspected for scratches or dings on the lips and on the mating surfaces. If necessary, have it refinished / reground.

ul.li: Don’t touch the slot die with any metal objects when swapping / cleaning, which creates scratches and dings

conbody.p: Don’t touch the top jaw with the bottom jaw and vice versa.
